description:
Welcome to the Michigan District, LCMS! We are excited to have you join us in ministry in Michigan! We designed this course to cover a variety of topics that you'll need to know about going into your first year of teaching.

This Udemy video course covers topics like:

  • Personal items you'll need to consider
    • Housing allowance
    • Insurance issues
    • Personal budgeting
  • Building relationships with parents and fellow educators
  • Developing Professional Networks
This course is structured into four sections and can be completed at your own pace. This is our first year offering this video course, and we look forward to learning how can we best improve this for the future.

Have a great year!
title: Welcoming Teachers to the Michigan District, LCMS
